links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-1)
formula: a(n)=Fibonacci(n)+Fibonacci(n+6)-1, n>=-2 - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 01 2008G.f. ( 1+3*x-3*x^2 ) / ( (x-1)*(x^2+x-1) ). a(n) = A022112(n)-1. - R. J. Mathar, Apr 07 2011
prog: (Haskell)a022319 n = a022319_list !! (n-1)a022319_list = 1 : 5 : zipWith (+)   (map (+ 1) a022319_list) (tail a022319_list)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 26 2013
